mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(TO_USER_ID, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_STATE, CATEGORY, NOTICE_USER_ID , NOTICE_BOARD_NO, NOTICE_MOIM_NO, NOTICE_MEF_NO, NOTICE_REPLY_NO, NOTICE_MEETING_NO, NOTICE_LETTER_NO , CHAT_ROOM_NO) VALUES (#{notice.toUserId}, #{notice.noticeContent}, now(), "1", #{notice.noticeType}, #{notice.noticeUser.userId}, #{notice.board.boardNo}, #{notice.moim.mmNo}, #{notice.mef.meflNo}, #{notice.meeting.mtNo}, #{notice.reply.replyNo}, #{notice.letter.letterNo}, #{notice.chatRoomNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE notice_no in (#{noticeNo})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* ,@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS RNUM FROM (SELECT n.* , u.user_id , u.nickname as userNickname , u.profile_image as userImage , b.* , m.MM_NAME , mt.mt_content , rp.reply_content, mef.MEFL_NO , member.nickname as memberNickname , member.profile_image as memberImage FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN users u ON n.notice_user_id = u.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN board b ON n.notice_board_no = b.bd_no LEFT OUTER JOIN moim m ON n.notice_moim_no = m.mm_no LEFT OUTER JOIN MEETING_FLASH_MEMBER mef ON n.notice_mef_no = mef.target_no LEFT OUTER JOIN meeting mt ON n.notice_meeting_no = mt.mt_no LEFT OUTER JOIN reply rp ON n.notice_reply_no = rp.reply_no LEFT OUTER JOIN users member ON mef.MEFL_ID = member.user_id WHERE n.to_user_id in (#{userId}) ORDER BY n.notice_regdate DESC) inner_table , (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R) tables WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
